frontend_dev.title: Frontend Development
frontend_dev.description: Building modern and responsive user interfaces using cutting-edge technologies. Specialized in creating dynamic and interactive web applications with React and Next.js.
backend_dev.title: Backend Development
backend_dev.description: Developing robust and scalable server-side solutions with Node.js and Next.js. Creating efficient APIs and implementing secure authentication systems.
database_dev.title: Database Management
database_dev.description: Designing and implementing efficient database structures using MongoDB. Optimizing queries and ensuring data integrity for high-performance applications.
fullstack_dev.title: Full Stack Solutions
fullstack_dev.description: Delivering end-to-end web applications with modern tech stack. Integrating frontend and backend seamlessly for optimal user experience and performance.
